attributes.action: give Local Councils authority to purchase land within their overall plan at a reasonable price.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: They could then contract developers/builders to build to need. At present devlopers keep house prices high by offering land owners 150 times agricultural value if they can persuade Councils or Ministers (on appeal) to grant planning permission. It must stop if affordable housing is to be provided to rent or buy for young people in the future.
